thestorygraph.buttonViewBook.description: Used as the title for the button in Discord.

thestorygraph.viewBook.description: Used to display the details of a selected book.

thestorygraph.viewSimilarBook.description: Used to show books that are similar to the selected book.

thestorygraph.viewEdition.description: Used to view different editions of the selected book.

thestorygraph.viewContentWarnings.description: Used to display content warnings related to the selected book.

thestorygraph.readBookClubQuestions.description: Used to access questions for book club discussions.

thestorygraph.readReviews.description: Used to read reviews written about the selected book.

thestorygraph.readReview.description: Used to read a specific review of the selected book.

thestorygraph.buttonReadReview.description: Used as the title for the button in Discord.

thestorygraph.readalongs.description: Used to view readalongs available for the selected book.

thestorygraph.buddyReads.description: Used to show buddy reads in progress.

thestorygraph.bookTickets.description: Used to report a book issue or concern.

thestorygraph.viewReadingChallenges.description: Used to view challenges related to reading.

thestorygraph.viewCommunity.description: Used to view community interactions and discussions.

thestorygraph.viewBookClubs.description: Used to view available book clubs.

thestorygraph.viewSimilarUsers.description: Used to view users with similar reading interests.

thestorygraph.viewGiveaways.description: Used to view available book giveaways.

thestorygraph.viewGiveaway.description: Used to view a specific book giveaway.

thestorygraph.buttonViewGiveaway.description: Used as the title for the button in Discord.

thestorygraph.viewEnteredGiveaways.description: Used to view giveaways that the user has entered.

thestorygraph.viewNotifications.description: Used to view notifications related to user activities.

thestorygraph.viewProfile.description: Used to view the profile of a specific user.

thestorygraph.buttonViewProfile.description: Used as the title for the button in Discord.

thestorygraph.editProfile.description: Used to edit the user's profile information.

thestorygraph.viewReadingJournal.description: Used to view the user's reading journal.
